entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 22. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
